${ModID}:MalchezaarsImpPower.NAME: Malchezaar's Imp
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a #ynon-Imp card is #yExhausted, shuffle #b{0} #yImp into your discard pile.
Whenever a #ynon-Imp card is #yExhausted, shuffle #b{0} #yImps into your discard pile.

${ModID}:MalchezaarsImpUpgradedPower.NAME: Malchezaar's Imp+
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a #ynon-Imp card is #yExhausted, shuffle #b{0} #yImp into your draw pile.
Whenever a #ynon-Imp card is #yExhausted, shuffle #b{0} #yImps into your draw pile.
